ValidationRule.description: New accounts cannot be created without service country (if Umbrella company = False) RO-717
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator'), ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL(Service_Country__c, ""), Umbrella_Company__c = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not create an Account without a Service Country if it is not an Umbrella Company. Please define a Service Country.
